properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 8:57AM CST until January 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
L'anguille River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the L'anguille River at Palestine
* from Tuesday January 14 until Wednesday January 15.
* At 08 AM Sunday the stage was...23.7 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 25.0 feet on Tuesday January 14.
* Flood stage is 25.0 feet.
At 25.0 feet, Flooding of large areas of agricultural land along the
river is occurring..
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Sunday evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
